feiticosDominados.name: Wingardium Leviosa
feiticosDominados.description: Causes an object to levitate; but remember what Hermione said: "It's Wing-gar-dium Levi-o-sa, make the 'gar' nice and long.'"
feiticosDominados.comentario: Aprendam a entonar corretamente o feitiço!

feiticosDominados.name: Sonorus
feiticosDominados.description: Amplifies the witch or wizard's voice

feiticosAAprender.name: Apparate
feiticosAAprender.description: A non-verbal transportation spell that allows a witch or wizard to instantly travel on the spot and appear at another location (disapparate is the opposite)

feiticosDominados.name: Expecto patronum
feiticosDominados.description: The Patronus Charm is a powerful projection of hope and happiness that drives away Dementors; a corpeal Patronus takes the the respective animal form of the caster, while a non-corpeal appears as a wisp of light; at 13, Harry Potter was the youngest known witch or wizard to prouduce a corpeal Patronus

feiticosDominados.name: Apparate
feiticosDominados.description: A non-verbal transportation spell that allows a witch or wizard to instantly travel on the spot and appear at another location (disapparate is the opposite)

feiticosDominados.name: Avada Kedavra
feiticosDominados.description: Also known as The Killing Curse, the most evil spell in the Wizarding World; one of three Unforgivable Curses; Harry Potter is the only known witch or wizard to survive it
